question: What studies are investigating diabetes?
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Diabetes Mellitus'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Diabetes Mellitus' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: Which facilities in California are conducting Phase 3 studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE facilities.state = 'California' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 3'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE facilities.state = 'California' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 3' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: How many studies are sponsored by Pfizer?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studies JOIN sponsors_studies ON studies.nct_id = sponsors_studies.nct_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors_studies.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id WHERE sponsors.name = 'Pfizer'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]->(sponsors_studies)-[BY_SPONSOR]->(sponsors) WHERE sponsors.name = 'Pfizer' RETURN COUNT(studies)

question: List studies using aspirin as an intervention.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN interventions_studies ON studies.nct_id = interventions_studies.nct_id JOIN interventions ON interventions_studies.intervention_id = interventions.intervention_id WHERE interventions.mesh_term = 'Aspirin'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]->(interventions_studies)-[FOR_INTERVENTION]->(interventions) WHERE interventions.mesh_term = 'Aspirin' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: What are the primary outcomes for studies about cancer?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT outcomes.title FROM outcomes JOIN studies ON outcomes.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term LIKE '%Cancer%' AND outcomes.outcome_type = 'Primary'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_OUTCOME]->(outcomes), (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term CONTAINS 'Cancer' AND outcomes.outcome_type = 'Primary' RETURN DISTINCT outcomes.title

question: How many interventional studies are being conducted in New York?
sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM studies JOIN facilities_studies ON studies.nct_id = facilities_studies.nct_id JOIN facilities ON facilities_studies.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE facilities.state = 'New York' AND studies.study_type = 'Interventional'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]->(facilities_studies)-[AT_FACILITY]->(facilities) WHERE facilities.state = 'New York' AND studies.study_type = 'Interventional' RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT studies)

question: Which sponsors are funding studies on hypertension?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT sponsors.name FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id JOIN studies ON sponsors_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Hypertension'
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies)<-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Hypertension' RETURN DISTINCT sponsors.name

question: List Phase 2 studies that accept healthy volunteers.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' AND eligibilities.healthy_volunteers = 'Accepts Healthy Volunteers'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' AND eligibilities.healthy_volunteers = 'Accepts Healthy Volunteers' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: What interventions are being tested in studies with more than 500 participants?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.enrollment > 500
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.enrollment > 500 RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: How many studies have both randomized allocation and double masking?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.allocation = 'Randomized' AND designs.masking = 'Double'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.allocation = 'Randomized' AND designs.masking = 'Double' RETURN COUNT(studies)

question: Which facilities in Boston are conducting cancer studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE facilities.city = 'Boston' AND conditions.mesh_term LIKE '%Cancer%'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE facilities.city = 'Boston' AND conditions.mesh_term CONTAINS 'Cancer' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: Count the number of studies by study type.
sql: SELECT studies.study_type, COUNT(*) FROM studies GROUP BY studies.study_type
cypher: MATCH (studies) RETURN studies.study_type, COUNT(studies)

question: What are the top 5 most common conditions being studied?
sql: SELECT conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(*) FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id GROUP BY conditions.mesh_term ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies) RETURN conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(conditions_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(conditions_studies) DESC LIMIT 5

question: List studies sponsored by industry conducting Phase 3 trials.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN sponsors_studies ON studies.nct_id = sponsors_studies.nct_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors_studies.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'INDUSTRY' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 3'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]->(sponsors_studies)-[BY_SPONSOR]->(sponsors) WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'INDUSTRY' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 3' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies test each intervention type?
sql: SELECT interventions.mesh_term, COUNT(*) FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id GROUP BY interventions.mesh_term ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 20
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies) RETURN interventions.mesh_term, COUNT(interventions_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(interventions_studies) DESC LIMIT 20

question: Which studies in Texas are FDA regulated drugs?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN facilities_studies ON studies.nct_id = facilities_studies.nct_id JOIN facilities ON facilities_studies.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE facilities.state = 'Texas' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]->(facilities_studies)-[AT_FACILITY]->(facilities) WHERE facilities.state = 'Texas' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT studies.brief_title

question: What is the average enrollment for Phase 3 studies?
sql: SELECT AVG(studies.enrollment) FROM studies WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 3'
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 3' RETURN AVG(studies.enrollment)

question: List all observational studies with prospective time perspective.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' AND designs.time_perspective = 'Prospective'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' AND designs.time_perspective = 'Prospective' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies are conducted at each facility in California?
sql: SELECT facilities.name, COUNT(*) FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id WHERE facilities.state = 'California' GROUP BY facilities.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies) WHERE facilities.state = 'California' RETURN facilities.name, COUNT(facilities_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(facilities_studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: Which conditions are studied in randomized controlled trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.allocation = 'Randomized'
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.allocation = 'Randomized' RETURN DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term

question: What are the withdrawal reasons for studies with more than 100 participants?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT drop_withdrawals.reason FROM drop_withdrawals JOIN studies ON drop_withdrawals.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.enrollment > 100
cypher: MATCH (drop_withdrawals)<-[HAS_WITHDRAWAL]-(studies) WHERE studies.enrollment > 100 RETURN DISTINCT drop_withdrawals.reason

question: List NIH-sponsored studies on cardiovascular diseases.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN sponsors_studies ON studies.nct_id = sponsors_studies.nct_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors_studies.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'NIH' AND conditions.mesh_term LIKE '%Cardiovascular%'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]->(sponsors_studies)-[BY_SPONSOR]->(sponsors), (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'NIH' AND conditions.mesh_term CONTAINS 'Cardiovascular' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies include children as participants?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studies JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE eligibilities.child = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE eligibilities.child = 'true' RETURN COUNT(studies)

question: What interventions are used in treatment studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Treatment'
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Treatment' RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: Which facilities are conducting studies with parallel assignment design?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Parallel Assignment'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Parallel Assignment' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: Count studies by phase.
sql: SELECT studies.phase, COUNT(*) FROM studies GROUP BY studies.phase ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies) RETURN studies.phase, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: What are the most studied conditions in Phase 1 trials?
sql: SELECT conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(*) FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 1' GROUP BY conditions.mesh_term ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 1' RETURN conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(conditions_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(conditions_studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List studies that have reported adverse events and are FDA regulated.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN reported_event_totals ON studies.nct_id = reported_event_totals.nct_id WHERE studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_EVENT_TOTAL]->(reported_event_totals) WHERE studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT studies.brief_title

question: How many studies have each masking type?
sql: SELECT designs.masking, COUNT(*) FROM designs JOIN studies ON designs.nct_id = studies.nct_id GROUP BY designs.masking ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) RETURN designs.masking, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: Which sponsors fund the most Phase 2 studies?
sql: SELECT sponsors.name, COUNT(*) FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id JOIN studies ON sponsors_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' GROUP BY sponsors.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies)<-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' RETURN sponsors.name, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: What are the outcomes for diabetes studies with more than 200 participants?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT outcomes.title FROM outcomes JOIN studies ON outcomes.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Diabetes Mellitus' AND studies.enrollment > 200
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_OUTCOME]->(outcomes), (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Diabetes Mellitus' AND studies.enrollment > 200 RETURN DISTINCT outcomes.title

question: List studies in Florida that include older adults.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN facilities_studies ON studies.nct_id = facilities_studies.nct_id JOIN facilities ON facilities_studies.facility_id = facilities.facility_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE facilities.state = 'Florida' AND eligibilities.older_adult = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]->(facilities_studies)-[AT_FACILITY]->(facilities), (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE facilities.state = 'Florida' AND eligibilities.older_adult = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT studies.brief_title

question: How many interventional studies are sponsored by each agency class?
sql: SELECT sponsors.agency_class, COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id JOIN studies ON sponsors_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.study_type = 'Interventional' GROUP BY sponsors.agency_class
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies)<-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Interventional' RETURN sponsors.agency_class, COUNT(DISTINCT studies)

question: What conditions are being studied in crossover design trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Crossover Assignment'
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Crossover Assignment' RETURN DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term

question: Which interventions are most commonly tested in Phase 3 trials?
sql: SELECT interventions.mesh_term, COUNT(*) FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 3' GROUP BY interventions.mesh_term ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 3' RETURN interventions.mesh_term, COUNT(interventions_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(interventions_studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List studies with triple masking that are randomized.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.masking = 'Triple' AND designs.allocation = 'Randomized'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.masking = 'Triple' AND designs.allocation = 'Randomized' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies per state are conducting cancer research?
sql: SELECT facilities.state, COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term LIKE '%Cancer%' GROUP BY facilities.state ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) DESC LIMIT 15
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term CONTAINS 'Cancer' RETURN facilities.state, COUNT(DISTINCT studies) ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT studies) DESC LIMIT 15

question: What is the maximum enrollment for studies in each phase?
sql: SELECT studies.phase, MAX(studies.enrollment) FROM studies GROUP BY studies.phase
cypher: MATCH (studies) RETURN studies.phase, MAX(studies.enrollment)

question: Which facilities in Massachusetts are conducting observational studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE facilities.state = 'Massachusetts' AND studies.study_type = 'Observational'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE facilities.state = 'Massachusetts' AND studies.study_type = 'Observational' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: List prevention studies that accept healthy volunteers.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Prevention' AND eligibilities.healthy_volunteers = 'Accepts Healthy Volunteers'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs), (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Prevention' AND eligibilities.healthy_volunteers = 'Accepts Healthy Volunteers' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies are there for each intervention model?
sql: SELECT designs.intervention_model, COUNT(*) FROM designs JOIN studies ON designs.nct_id = studies.nct_id GROUP BY designs.intervention_model ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) RETURN designs.intervention_model, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: What are the top 10 sponsors by number of studies?
sql: SELECT sponsors.name, COUNT(*) FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id GROUP BY sponsors.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies) RETURN sponsors.name, COUNT(sponsors_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(sponsors_studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: Which studies in Chicago are testing drug interventions?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN facilities_studies ON studies.nct_id = facilities_studies.nct_id JOIN facilities ON facilities_studies.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE facilities.city = 'Chicago' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]->(facilities_studies)-[AT_FACILITY]->(facilities) WHERE facilities.city = 'Chicago' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT studies.brief_title

question: Count studies by primary purpose.
sql: SELECT designs.primary_purpose, COUNT(*) FROM designs JOIN studies ON designs.nct_id = studies.nct_id GROUP BY designs.primary_purpose ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) RETURN designs.primary_purpose, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: What interventions are used in diabetes prevention studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Diabetes Mellitus' AND designs.primary_purpose = 'Prevention'
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs), (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Diabetes Mellitus' AND designs.primary_purpose = 'Prevention' RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: List studies with more than 3 arms.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies WHERE studies.number_of_arms > 3 ORDER BY studies.number_of_arms DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.number_of_arms > 3 RETURN studies.brief_title ORDER BY studies.number_of_arms DESC

question: How many studies include female-only participants?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studies JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE eligibilities.gender = 'Female'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE eligibilities.gender = 'Female' RETURN COUNT(studies)

question: Which conditions are studied most in observational cohort studies?
sql: SELECT conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(*) FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' AND designs.observational_model = 'Cohort' GROUP BY conditions.mesh_term ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' AND designs.observational_model = 'Cohort' RETURN conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(conditions_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(conditions_studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: What is the average enrollment for interventional studies?
sql: SELECT AVG(studies.enrollment) FROM studies WHERE studies.study_type = 'Interventional'
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Interventional' RETURN AVG(studies.enrollment)

question: List studies with quadruple masking.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.masking = 'Quadruple'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.masking = 'Quadruple' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: Which facilities are running the most clinical trials?
sql: SELECT facilities.name, COUNT(*) FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id GROUP BY facilities.name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 20
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies) RETURN facilities.name, COUNT(facilities_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(facilities_studies) DESC LIMIT 20

question: How many studies involve subjects at risk for adverse events?
sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM studies JOIN reported_event_totals ON studies.nct_id = reported_event_totals.nct_id WHERE reported_event_totals.subjects_at_risk > 0
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_EVENT_TOTAL]->(reported_event_totals) WHERE reported_event_totals.subjects_at_risk > 0 RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT studies)

question: What conditions are being studied in single group assignment trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Single Group Assignment'
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Single Group Assignment' RETURN DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term

question: List industry-sponsored Phase 1 studies.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN sponsors_studies ON studies.nct_id = sponsors_studies.nct_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors_studies.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'INDUSTRY' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 1'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]->(sponsors_studies)-[BY_SPONSOR]->(sponsors) WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'INDUSTRY' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 1' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies started in 2019?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studies WHERE studies.start_date >= '2019-01-01' AND studies.start_date < '2020-01-01'
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.start_date >= datetime('2019-01-01T00:00:00') AND studies.start_date < datetime('2020-01-01T00:00:00') RETURN COUNT(studies)

question: Which interventions are tested in non-randomized trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.allocation = 'Non-Randomized'
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.allocation = 'Non-Randomized' RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: What are the outcomes for hypertension studies in Phase 3?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT outcomes.title FROM outcomes JOIN studies ON outcomes.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Hypertension' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 3'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_OUTCOME]->(outcomes), (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Hypertension' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 3' RETURN DISTINCT outcomes.title

question: Count the number of studies per city in California.
sql: SELECT facilities.city, COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE facilities.state = 'California' GROUP BY facilities.city ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE facilities.state = 'California' RETURN facilities.city, COUNT(DISTINCT studies) ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT studies) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List studies that are both FDA regulated drugs and devices.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies WHERE studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_device = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_device = 'true' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: Which sponsors fund studies in pediatric populations?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT sponsors.name FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id JOIN studies ON sponsors_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE eligibilities.child = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies)<-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE eligibilities.child = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT sponsors.name

question: What is the total enrollment across all Phase 2 studies?
sql: SELECT SUM(studies.enrollment) FROM studies WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2'
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' RETURN SUM(studies.enrollment)

question: List diagnostic studies with case-control design.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Diagnostic' AND designs.observational_model = 'Case-Control'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Diagnostic' AND designs.observational_model = 'Case-Control' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies by each sponsor class are conducting cancer research?
sql: SELECT sponsors.agency_class, COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id JOIN studies ON sponsors_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term LIKE '%Cancer%' GROUP BY sponsors.agency_class
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies)<-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term CONTAINS 'Cancer' RETURN sponsors.agency_class, COUNT(DISTINCT studies)

question: Which facilities in New York are conducting Phase 2 trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE facilities.state = 'New York' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 2'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE facilities.state = 'New York' AND studies.phase = 'Phase 2' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: What are the most common primary purposes across all studies?
sql: SELECT designs.primary_purpose, COUNT(*) FROM designs GROUP BY designs.primary_purpose ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
cypher: MATCH (designs) RETURN designs.primary_purpose, COUNT(designs) ORDER BY COUNT(designs) DESC LIMIT 10

question: List studies with factorial assignment intervention model.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Factorial Assignment'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Factorial Assignment' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies include male-only participants?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM studies JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE eligibilities.gender = 'Male'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE eligibilities.gender = 'Male' RETURN COUNT(studies)

question: Which conditions are studied in retrospective observational studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' AND designs.time_perspective = 'Retrospective'
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' AND designs.time_perspective = 'Retrospective' RETURN DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term

question: What is the minimum enrollment for Phase 4 studies?
sql: SELECT MIN(studies.enrollment) FROM studies WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 4'
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 4' RETURN MIN(studies.enrollment)

question: List studies in Pennsylvania that do not accept healthy volunteers.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN facilities_studies ON studies.nct_id = facilities_studies.nct_id JOIN facilities ON facilities_studies.facility_id = facilities.facility_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE facilities.state = 'Pennsylvania' AND eligibilities.healthy_volunteers = 'No'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]->(facilities_studies)-[AT_FACILITY]->(facilities), (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE facilities.state = 'Pennsylvania' AND eligibilities.healthy_volunteers = 'No' RETURN DISTINCT studies.brief_title

question: How many studies per allocation type?
sql: SELECT designs.allocation, COUNT(*) FROM designs GROUP BY designs.allocation ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (designs) RETURN designs.allocation, COUNT(designs) ORDER BY COUNT(designs) DESC

question: What interventions are being tested for asthma?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Asthma'
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term = 'Asthma' RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: Which facilities in Los Angeles are conducting interventional trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE facilities.city = 'Los Angeles' AND studies.study_type = 'Interventional'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE facilities.city = 'Los Angeles' AND studies.study_type = 'Interventional' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: List studies with sequential assignment design.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Sequential Assignment'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.intervention_model = 'Sequential Assignment' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies have outcomes with p-values less than 0.05?
sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM studies JOIN outcomes ON studies.nct_id = outcomes.nct_id JOIN outcome_analyses ON outcomes.id = outcome_analyses.outcome_id WHERE outcome_analyses.p_value < 0.05
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_OUTCOME]->(outcomes)-[HAS_ANALYSIS]->(outcome_analyses) WHERE outcome_analyses.p_value < 0.05 RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT studies)

question: What are the top 5 conditions studied in Phase 4 trials?
sql: SELECT conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(*) FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 4' GROUP BY conditions.mesh_term ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 5
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 4' RETURN conditions.mesh_term, COUNT(conditions_studies) ORDER BY COUNT(conditions_studies) DESC LIMIT 5

question: List studies sponsored by universities.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN sponsors_studies ON studies.nct_id = sponsors_studies.nct_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors_studies.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'OTHER' AND sponsors.name LIKE '%University%'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]->(sponsors_studies)-[BY_SPONSOR]->(sponsors) WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'OTHER' AND sponsors.name CONTAINS 'University' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many observational studies use each observational model?
sql: SELECT designs.observational_model, COUNT(*) FROM designs JOIN studies ON designs.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' GROUP BY designs.observational_model ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' RETURN designs.observational_model, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: Which conditions are being studied with drug interventions in Phase 2?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term FROM conditions JOIN conditions_studies ON conditions.condition_id = conditions_studies.condition_id JOIN studies ON conditions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (conditions)<-[FOR_CONDITION]-(conditions_studies)<-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE studies.phase = 'Phase 2' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT conditions.mesh_term

question: What is the average number of arms in interventional studies?
sql: SELECT AVG(studies.number_of_arms) FROM studies WHERE studies.study_type = 'Interventional' AND studies.number_of_arms IS NOT NULL
cypher: MATCH (studies) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Interventional' AND studies.number_of_arms IS NOT NULL RETURN AVG(studies.number_of_arms)

question: List studies in Texas with enrollment over 1000.
sql: SELECT DISTINCT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN facilities_studies ON studies.nct_id = facilities_studies.nct_id JOIN facilities ON facilities_studies.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE facilities.state = 'Texas' AND studies.enrollment > 1000
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]->(facilities_studies)-[AT_FACILITY]->(facilities) WHERE facilities.state = 'Texas' AND studies.enrollment > 1000 RETURN DISTINCT studies.brief_title

question: How many studies have each time perspective in observational designs?
sql: SELECT designs.time_perspective, COUNT(*) FROM designs JOIN studies ON designs.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' GROUP BY designs.time_perspective ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE studies.study_type = 'Observational' RETURN designs.time_perspective, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: Which interventions are used in studies that include older adults?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE eligibilities.older_adult = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE eligibilities.older_adult = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: What are secondary outcomes for cardiovascular studies?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT outcomes.title FROM outcomes JOIN studies ON outcomes.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN conditions_studies ON studies.nct_id = conditions_studies.nct_id JOIN conditions ON conditions_studies.condition_id = conditions.condition_id WHERE conditions.mesh_term LIKE '%Cardiovascular%' AND outcomes.outcome_type = 'Secondary'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_OUTCOME]->(outcomes), (studies)-[HAS_CONDITION_RECORD]->(conditions_studies)-[FOR_CONDITION]->(conditions) WHERE conditions.mesh_term CONTAINS 'Cardiovascular' AND outcomes.outcome_type = 'Secondary' RETURN DISTINCT outcomes.title

question: Count studies in each country.
sql: SELECT facilities.country, COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id GROUP BY facilities.country ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT studies.nct_id) DESC LIMIT 15
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) RETURN facilities.country, COUNT(DISTINCT studies) ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT studies) DESC LIMIT 15

question: List screening studies with more than 200 participants.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Screening' AND studies.enrollment > 200
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Screening' AND studies.enrollment > 200 RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many federal-sponsored studies are there per phase?
sql: SELECT studies.phase, COUNT(*) FROM studies JOIN sponsors_studies ON studies.nct_id = sponsors_studies.nct_id JOIN sponsors ON sponsors_studies.sponsor_id = sponsors.sponsor_id WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'FED' GROUP BY studies.phase ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]->(sponsors_studies)-[BY_SPONSOR]->(sponsors) WHERE sponsors.agency_class = 'FED' RETURN studies.phase, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: Which facilities in San Francisco are conducting drug trials?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT facilities.name FROM facilities JOIN facilities_studies ON facilities.facility_id = facilities_studies.facility_id JOIN studies ON facilities_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE facilities.city = 'San Francisco' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (facilities)<-[AT_FACILITY]-(facilities_studies)<-[HAS_FACILITY_RECORD]-(studies) WHERE facilities.city = 'San Francisco' AND studies.is_fda_regulated_drug = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT facilities.name

question: What is the total number of study withdrawals reported?
sql: SELECT SUM(drop_withdrawals.count) FROM drop_withdrawals
cypher: MATCH (drop_withdrawals) RETURN SUM(drop_withdrawals.count)

question: List supportive care studies that include adults.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Supportive Care' AND eligibilities.adult = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs), (studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE designs.primary_purpose = 'Supportive Care' AND eligibilities.adult = 'true' RETURN studies.brief_title

question: How many studies are there for each enrollment type?
sql: SELECT studies.enrollment_type, COUNT(*) FROM studies GROUP BY studies.enrollment_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (studies) RETURN studies.enrollment_type, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY COUNT(studies) DESC

question: Which interventions are being tested in pediatric populations?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term FROM interventions JOIN interventions_studies ON interventions.intervention_id = interventions_studies.intervention_id JOIN studies ON interventions_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id JOIN eligibilities ON studies.nct_id = eligibilities.nct_id WHERE eligibilities.child = 'true'
cypher: MATCH (interventions)<-[FOR_INTERVENTION]-(interventions_studies)<-[HAS_INTERVENTION_RECORD]-(studies)-[HAS_ELIGIBILITY]->(eligibilities) WHERE eligibilities.child = 'true' RETURN DISTINCT interventions.mesh_term

question: What are outcomes for studies with more than 5 arms?
sql: SELECT DISTINCT outcomes.title FROM outcomes JOIN studies ON outcomes.nct_id = studies.nct_id WHERE studies.number_of_arms > 5
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_OUTCOME]->(outcomes) WHERE studies.number_of_arms > 5 RETURN DISTINCT outcomes.title

question: Count studies by sponsor type and phase.
sql: SELECT sponsors.agency_class, studies.phase, COUNT(*) FROM sponsors JOIN sponsors_studies ON sponsors.sponsor_id = sponsors_studies.sponsor_id JOIN studies ON sponsors_studies.nct_id = studies.nct_id GROUP BY sponsors.agency_class, studies.phase ORDER BY sponsors.agency_class, COUNT(*) DESC
cypher: MATCH (sponsors)<-[BY_SPONSOR]-(sponsors_studies)<-[HAS_SPONSOR_RECORD]-(studies) RETURN sponsors.agency_class, studies.phase, COUNT(studies) ORDER BY sponsors.agency_class, COUNT(studies) DESC

question: List open-label studies with parallel assignment.
sql: SELECT studies.brief_title FROM studies JOIN designs ON studies.nct_id = designs.nct_id WHERE designs.masking = 'None (Open Label)' AND designs.intervention_model = 'Parallel Assignment'
cypher: MATCH (studies)-[HAS_DESIGN]->(designs) WHERE designs.masking = 'None (Open Label)' AND designs.intervention_model = 'Parallel Assignment' RETURN studies.brief_title
